title: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The behavior as described in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 is not being observed. The Reload link does not include the custom cookie name in the URL.
EB: Expected result: According to Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, the Reload link should include the custom cookie name in the URL.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application in a web browser.
2. Navigate to the Reload link.
3. Check the URL and verify if the custom cookie name is present in it.
